entry.title: Hello Traveller 🍄
entry.summary:
👏 Congratulations! You find my blog FINALLY!🤡

Introduction👇

📝 You can know about the life or study of the blogger , and taste the different chocolates at different instants of time .

🏷️ Tags will be varied and you can choose what you like .

📋 It is used to keep a diary or share knowledge about IT , Art , Math , History and somthing else.

🌎 I will keep different language (Chinese and English in most time) versions to write at this site .
